attributes.action: Provide More Support & Treatment And To Raise Awareness For People With BorderLine Personality Disorders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The NHS mental Health Trusts do not have the resources to help treat people suffering borderline personality disorders, unless they actually do something wrong.
They are excluded from society by everyone, because the disorders are not understood.
In order to get help you have to commit criminal acts or harm yourself.
Please Provide More Support & Treatment And To Raise Awareness For People With Personality Disorders, as you have a valuable part of society which is excluded from everything.
